
add_module(opencv)

module_add_includes(include)

if (${CMAKE_GENERATOR} STREQUAL "Visual Studio 11")
  if(TIKI_BUILD_32BIT)
    module_add_binarys(lib/x86/vc11/bin)
    module_add_libraries(lib/x86/vc11/lib)
  else()
    module_add_binarys(lib/x64/vc11/bin)
    module_add_libraries(lib/x64/vc11/lib)
  endif()
elseif(${CMAKE_GENERATOR} STREQUAL "Visual Studio 10")
  if(TIKI_BUILD_32BIT)
    module_add_binarys(lib/x86/vc10/bin)
    module_add_libraries(lib/x86/vc10/lib)
  else()
    module_add_binarys(lib/x64/vc10/bin)
    module_add_libraries(lib/x64/vc10/lib)
  endif()
else()
  message(ERROR "OpenCV don't support this Platform.")
endif()
